properties.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Elkhead and Park Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 3:10AM MST until February 17 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20
inches with amounts above 2 feet on favored peaks and ridges.
Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult to impossible. Areas
of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, especially
over Rabbit Ears Pass. A detailed map of the snowfall can be
found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MST MONDAY
